thread.title: Fashion Loves Art Chicago Event Holds Call Model Casting on Thursday October 22, 2015 at Shine Dance Move Studio in Chicago at 8PM

author: cbs8
title: Fashion Loves Art Chicago Event Holds Call Model Casting on Thursday October 22, 2015 at Shine Dance Move Studio in Chicago at 8PM
text:
SA Style Studio
Event seeks Female & Male Chicago Models to Participate in Charity Fashion and Art Event Benefiting Ronald McDonald House Charities Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana
CHICAGO , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SA Style Studio is looking for top Chicago area models to participate in the Fashion Loves Art event, ( http://www.fashionlovesart.org/ ) . The open call will be held on Thursday October 22, 2015 from 8PM-9PM at the Shine Dance Move Studio at 1102 N. Ashland Avenue, Chicago, Il.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279285LOGO
Female models wishing to participate must be dress size 0 to 2 for women, and size x-small to medium for men. The Fashion Loves Art event is a collaborative fashion show and silent auction to benefit the Ronald McDonald House of Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana , ( http://rmhccni.org/ ), to help aid children battling chronic illness. Tickets must be purchased in advance of the event. VIP ticket holders will have early bird access to the art gallery, VIP gift bags featuring exclusive goods provided by The Mane Choice, Z Skin Cosmetics, Casetify, The Pure Bar, and many more!
" Chicago is full of lively, talented individuals. We're looking for top talent to walk the show and help represent and showcase these designer's exquisite work. This will be a great event to combine the aspects of fashion and art, and introduce the Chicago Market to incredible designers and artists for an amazing cause," states creator of Fashion Loves Art and CEO of SA Style Studio, Stephanie Alexis . "The concept of Fashion Loves Art stems from the fact that fashion and art have always gone hand in hand. I wanted to organize a special event that would give back to my community by way of the Ronald McDonald House. I whole heartedly believe and support the Ronald McDonald House's effective initiatives that have aided this Chicago community, so partnering with them was a no brainer."
SA Style Studio has partnered with Ronald McDonald House of Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana to bring an exciting, interesting, and most importantly fun event to raise money and awareness for children in need. The event will be held on Friday October 23, 2015 at Moonlight Studios located at 1446 Kinzie Street Chicago, IL from 6PM to 10PM . An exclusively curated selection of fashion pieces will be shown on the runway for a short fashion show featuring designers Silvia Bours, Tianna Barnes , Harkiss Designs, Chicago Playground, Stello Official, Aurelia Garza , Nicole Andrews , and Filthy Haanz, as well as an array of displayed art pieces up for silent auction by artists Katrina Jackson of VH1's Black Ink Crew, Joey Africa , Miriam Zuckerman , Rome Won, and Goons. Media sponsors for the event include HALFSTACK Magazine. Tickets for the Fashion Loves Art event are currently on sale starting at $50.00 per person and can be purchased directly at http://www.fashionlovesart.org/ . Attendees are welcome to hors d'oeuvres and beverages at cocktail hour, with the evening's music provided by Personalities Inc. Participating artists will exhibit various curated pieces in a gallery style so attendees can view items, all pieces will be available for purchase during the silent auction.
For more information on Fashion Loves Art, to Sponsor or for Media Inquiries please Email or call 1.877.841.7244.
About SA Style Studio
SA Style Studio was founded in 2014 by Stylist Stephanie Alexis White. The esteemed company's mission is to make fashion fun and easy for their clients, offering a wide array services including personal styling, image consulting, wardrobe styling, fashion publication consultation, trend forecasting, and acting as a brand ambassador for a variety of fashion houses. For more information on SA Style Studio, please visit http://www.sastylestudio.com/ .
Media Contact:
Wendy Vazquez
Beautiful Planning Marketing & PR: Fashion, Beauty & Lifestyle Division
877.841.7244
Email
